QuestData.Title: The Stone March
QuestData.Description: My forces have already begun the assault. Join them. Spill the blood of these cultists upon the ground, that I might feel how they suffer.
QuestData.CompletionText: Our revenge against the worshipers of Deathwing has finally arrived. It is a sweet revenge.
QuestData.RewardText: Their blood upon the earth is a sweet thing. I shall cherish every moment, slowly extinguishing the stragglers from my realm.
